title: ‘Waiting for you for so long’: Residents cheer Ukrainian soldiers arriving as Russians withdraw.
dc:creator: Andrew E. Kramer

media:content.media:credit: Lynsey Addario for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: A Ukrainian woman wept on Thursday after Ukrainian soldiers entered the village of Snihurivka, a road hub north of Kherson City that had been occupied by Russian soldiers.
